name: locks
description: Number of locks for all users

name: nested triggers
description: Allow triggers to be invoked within triggers

name: server trigger recursion
description: Allow recursion for server level triggers

name: remote proc trans
description: Create DTC transaction for remote procedures

name: max text repl size (B)
description: Maximum size of a text field in replication.

name: query wait (s)
description: maximum time to wait for query memory (s)

name: query governor cost limit
description: Maximum estimated cost allowed by query governor

name: lightweight pooling
description: User mode scheduler uses lightweight pooling

name: transform noise words
description: Transform noise words for full-text query

name: precompute rank
description: Use precomputed rank for full-text query

name: PH timeout (s)
description: DB connection timeout for full-text protocol handler (s)

name: clr enabled
description: CLR user code execution enabled in the server

name: max full-text crawl range
description: Maximum  crawl ranges allowed in full-text indexing

name: ft notify bandwidth (min)
description: Number of reserved full-text notifications buffers

name: ft notify bandwidth (max)
description: Max number of full-text notifications buffers

name: ft crawl bandwidth (min)
description: Number of reserved full-text crawl buffers

name: ft crawl bandwidth (max)
description: Max number of full-text crawl buffers

name: default trace enabled
description: Enable or disable the default trace

name: in-doubt xact resolution
description: Recovery policy for DTC transactions with unknown outcome

name: remote admin connections
description: Dedicated Admin Connections are allowed from remote clients

name: backup compression default
description: Enable compression of backups by default

name: optimize for ad hoc workloads
description: When this option is set, plan cache size is further reduced for single-use adhoc OLTP workload.

name: access check cache bucket count
description: Default hash bucket count for the access check result security cache

name: access check cache quota
description: Default quota for the access check result security cache

name: backup checksum default
description: Enable checksum of backups by default

name: automatic soft-NUMA disabled
description: Automatic soft-NUMA is enabled by default

name: clr strict security
description: CLR strict security enabled in the server

name: column encryption enclave type
description: Type of enclave used for computations on encrypted columns

name: tempdb metadata memory-optimized
description: Tempdb metadata memory-optimized is disabled by default.

name: Database Mail XPs
description: Enable or disable Database Mail XPs

name: SMO and DMO XPs
description: Enable or disable SMO and DMO XPs

name: Ole Automation Procedures
description: Enable or disable Ole Automation Procedures

name: Ad Hoc Distributed Queries
description: Enable or disable Ad Hoc Distributed Queries

name: contained database authentication
description: Enables contained databases and contained authentication

name: hadoop connectivity
description: Configure SQL Server to connect to external Hadoop or Microsoft Azure storage blob data sources through PolyBase

name: polybase network encryption
description: Configure SQL Server to encrypt control and data channels when using PolyBase

name: remote data archive
description: Allow the use of the REMOTE_DATA_ARCHIVE data access for databases

name: allow polybase export
description: Allow INSERT into a Hadoop external table

name: polybase enabled
description: Configure SQL Server to connect to external data sources through PolyBase
